name: Trials® Rising Sixty-Six
detailed_description: In Trials® Rising Sixty-Six, cruise and crash across the US along the famous Route 66 to experience the splendor that is the Land of Opportunity!
about_the_game: In Trials® Rising Sixty-Six, cruise and crash across the US along the famous Route 66 to experience the splendor that is the Land of Opportunity!
short_description: In Trials® Rising Sixty-Six, cruise and crash across the US along the famous Route 66 to experience the splendor that is the Land of Opportunity!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400, AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470, AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space

drm_notice:
Denuvo
5 Activations per 24 hours machine activation limit
